mapper.select: SELECT t.id, s.name "stadiumName", t.name "teamName", t.createDate , ( SELECT COUNT(*) + 1 FROM team WHERE name < t.name ) AS no FROM team t INNER JOIN stadium s ON t.stadiumId = s.id order by no
SELECT t.id, s.name "stadiumName", t.name "teamName", t.createDate FROM team t INNER JOIN stadium s ON t.stadiumId = s.id WHERE t.id = #{id} AND t.name = #{name}
mapper.update: UPDATE team SET name = #{name} , stadiumId =#{stadiumId} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO team(name, stadiumId, createDate) VALUES(#{name}, #{stadiumId} ,now())
